name: regular-elements
description: Custom Elements made available for any node, and through CSS selectors

scripts.build: rollup --config rollup.config.js && npm run cleanup && ascjs esm cjs && npm run min && npm run size
scripts.cleanup: cat index.js|sed 's/(exports)/()/'|sed 's/return exports;/return regularElements;/'|sed -e 's/exports.*;//g'|sed 's/({})/()/'>index.clean&&mv index.clean index.js

author: Andrea Giammarchi
